example_sentence_english: I want to cross the street.
I cross the river every day.
Do you cross the square with me?
We cross the city on foot.
You cross the park after school.
They cross the border at dawn.
I was crossing the park in the morning.
You were crossing the bridge often.

translation_english: he was crossing/she was crossing/you (formal) were crossing
example_sentence_italian: Lui attraversava il ponte ogni sera.
example_sentence_english: He was crossing the bridge every evening.
You were crossing the city every day.
They were crossing the square at night.

notes: used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'attraversato'
used with auxiliary avere; past participle 'attraversato'

translation_english: he has crossed/she has crossed/you (formal) have crossed
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal 'Lei'; past participle 'attraversato'
